name: .VCP File Extension
summary: Learn about .VCP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Software development project created by eMbedded Visual C++ (eVC), a Microsoft application used to develop programs for the Windows CE (Compact Edition) platform; contains project settings as well as references to source code files and project assets.

content: VCP files are used for saving and loading development progress, as well as building Windows CE applications. They can be converted into .VCPROJ files using Visual Studio 2005 and later.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.alt: Screenshot of a .vcp file in Casio ClassPad Manager for ClassPad II
images.caption: VCP file open in Casio ClassPad Manager for ClassPad II
